message: Starting Phase 3 (Verification) review - gathering handover and task context
Verifying Phase 3 deliverables - checking agents.py and phases.py for SQLite migration
Verifying code migration - testing dashboard API endpoints
All API endpoints verified working. Checking code migration success criteria.

Review completed. Phase 3 APPROVED. Verified: 1) agents.py and phases.py use state_db as PRIMARY source with JSON fallback. 2) All API endpoints tested and working. 3) SQLite-first pattern correctly implemented.
